nanovm.nibobee.drivers
Class LineDetector

java.lang.Object
  nanovm.nibobee.drivers.LineDetector

public class LineDetector
extends java.lang.Object

Encapsulates the information about the two IR-reflex-sensors for line detection. The values will be updated automatically by interrupt.
